Author: singingtangerine
Text: I’ve been in recovery a while and while this sub doesn’t necessarily help, it doesn’t hurt, either. It’s nice to see people post relatable things, because then it’s like, I’m not the only one struggling, you know?

Author: bir_die
Text: No because then I relapse because I miss restricting and hate the idea of not “participating” in my ED when in this community.
